channel.title: How to actually?
channel.description: hod do i actually get my server to connect, because when i go to the "run" or "runsever" file that is in the source folder it says something like "hi welcome to BLABLABLA" and wont go to anything past that, and how like if my server files on on my desktop then how do they like get online?

item.title: How to actually?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Ok Tenacious. When the runserver starts, it will show that one line until someone logs in.

You’re no-ip address isn’t working because you haven’t port-forwarded. Please follow the following tutorial to port-forward/open the port 43594.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html#post_portforward

Read full topic

item.title: How to actually?
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

noooo i know how to do the batch files… the run file is a batch file it will get to like, (welcome to bla bla bla) and then freeze up…

Read full topic

item.title: How to actually?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Open your server’s folder.
Inside it, right click and click new, then new text document.
Rename New Text Document.txt to Run.bat
Right click on Run.bat, and click Edit.
Inside of it, put:

@echo off
java server
pause

Save.
Run the newly created batch file.
Your server should now run.

Read full topic
